analyzed: de la thams cad nyid kyang lam de dag rnams las sems mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: thabs ma yin pas kun nas bcings nas skyes bu dmyal ba rnams su rgyug par byed do //

analyzed: yi dvags dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba yang ste / de dag rnams ni /

analyzed: bag med pa'i skyes bu mang po rnams tshogs pa 'dus pa gang yin pas bslus te /

analyzed: dmyal ba dang / yi dvags dang / dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //

original: dong du lhung ba dang / tshogs pa 'dus pa ni /

analyzed: gti mug gis rnam par rmongs pa dang / tshogs pa 'dus pa ni /

original: rnam par rmongs par byed pa dang / tshogs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam par rmongs par byed pa dang / tshogs pa 'di ni /

translated: They are the sole fear, and those who are afraid of existence alone, and those who are intent on seeing reality alone, should train in this way.

analyzed: rab tu zhi ba'i dgon pa rnams la dang / sgra'i ca co rnams spangs pas rab tu zhi bar gyur ba rnams su dang / shes bya nyi ma sten par byed pa rnams su dang / ri'i mthongs rnams su dang / shing gi drung rnams su dang /
translated: In places of complete peace, in places of complete peace due to the abandonment of noisy chatter, in places of the sun of knowledge, in mountain caves, at the foot of trees,

original: ma yin no //

analyzed: thos pa dang mi ldan pa / blo brtan po ma yin pa /

analyzed: dge ba rnams la spyod par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gzhan yang sman pa byed pa na skyon chen po rnams yod de; dge slong ma yin pa dge slong du dam 'cha' ba gang gi tshe rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyis srog chags rnams zil gyis mnan par gyur pa na de'i tshe rdzas lung 'bogs par byed
translated: Moreover, there are great faults in acting as a physician. When non-monks who pretend to be monks are overwhelmed by diseases such as wind disorders, they prescribe substances
and

analyzed: gcan gzan gyis bsad pa ma yin pa /

original: de ni nyams su myong bar gnas //
analyzed: de ni nyams su myong bar gnas //

original: rang gi las kyi ri mo yang //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi ri mo yang //

analyzed: rnam par rmongs pas ma mthong ngo //

original: ji srid du ni nor 'dod pas //
analyzed: ji srid du ni nor 'dod pas //

translated: Therefore, when practicing concentration, the monk should not create designs that are obstacles, that are faults, that are the basis for disrespect, and that are the basis for many faults.

analyzed: de dag la rnam par g-yeng bar gyur pa'i yid kyis bde legs thob par mi 'gyur ro //

original: tshon gyis bsgo bar mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshon gyis bsgo bar mi byed pa'o //

original: rjes su gzung ba ste /

analyzed: gzhan yang chos bzhi pa dge sbyong gis mi bya ste /

analyzed: gang dag snyan dngags byed par gyur pa de dag rnams ni /

analyzed: de'i yid rnam par g-yeng bar gyur pas ni /

analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur bas bsam gtan sgom par mi byed do //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos nyan pa la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gang dag chos nyid las 'das par gyur pa nyan pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba tsam 'ba' zhig pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa kun tu skyed par byed pa 'brel pa med pa rnams rjod par byed pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag

original: de'ang dam @289a *//

analyzed: de'ang snyan dngags kun tu sdeb pa de la blo song bar gyur pa yin no //

analyzed: des rmongs par gyur nas bar du gcod pa chen po rnams kyis bslus pa'i mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: is deluded by that, and he attains the highest deception by great obstacles.

original: rang gi don las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don las nyams pa yin no //
translated: You would be failing in your own purpose.

original: snyan dngags byed par gyur pa na skyon gzhan yang yod de /
analyzed: snyan dngags byed par gyur pa na skyon gzhan yang yod de /

translated: For the most part, poets compose poetry with a defiled mind, destroyed by discursive thought, and with defiled behavior.

analyzed: 'ga' yang mi 'byung ngo // ji ltar bud med kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams ni /
translated: And from that very discursive thought, no other discursive thought of that kind arises.

original: dge slong gis mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis mi bya'o //
translated: Monks should not have discursive thoughts about women.

original: rnam par rtog pa des kyang rang nyid sreg par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa des kyang rang nyid sreg par byed do //
translated: And that discursive thought burns you up.

original: me ji lta bar rang gi rnam par rtog pas sreg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me ji lta bar rang gi rnam par rtog pas sreg par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just like fire, they burn you with your own thoughts.🔽In this way, the thoughts of women arise in the minds of foolish people, and they see them for hundreds of thousands of lifetimes.

original: de ltar bud med kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang byis pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams thams cad nyid la skye ba gzhan brgya stong gi bar du'ang mthong ba yin no; ;snyan dngags rnams kyang dang po kho na bud med rnams la ci nas kyang 'bab pa yin🔽no // de bud med kyi rnam par rtog pas nye bar bcom par gyur pas ji srid du rkang pa nas go bo'i bar rnams la de @290a *//

translated: Poetry, too, is first of all about women.

original: srid du rnam pa du ma'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyed par 'gyur ba byis po'i skye bo rnams thams cad kyi yid 'phrog par byed par snyan dngags kyis bud med kyi lus kyi cha rnams des rab tu bsngags par byed do //
analyzed: srid du rnam pa du ma'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyed par 'gyur ba byis po'i skye bo rnams thams cad kyi yid 'phrog par byed par snyan dngags kyis bud med kyi lus kyi cha rnams des rab tu bsngags par byed do //
translated: When a man is destroyed by the thoughts of women, he will praise the parts of a woman’s body with poetry, in many ways, in an unwholesome manner, and with a mind that is carried away by foolish people.

original: mchod par byed do //
analyzed: mchod par byed do //
translated: He will worship her.

original: yid la'ang rab tu 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: yid la'ang rab tu 'jog par byed do //
translated: He also makes others settle their minds in the same way.

original: gtsang ma yin par rab tu ston no //
analyzed: gtsang ma yin par rab tu ston no //
translated: He teaches that this is pure.

original: de bdag nyid thams cad kyis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'khrid par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de bdag nyid thams cad kyis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'khrid par 'gyur la /
translated: He is led by improper mental activity in every way.

original: gzhan dag rnams kyang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de la rab tu 'god par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan dag rnams kyang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de la rab tu 'god par byed do //
translated: He also establishes others in that improper mental activity.

original: rang dang gzhan yongs su nyams par byed pa po de ni /
analyzed: rang dang gzhan yongs su nyams par byed pa po de ni /
translated: He is the one who causes himself and others to decline.

original: shi bar gyur nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan song log par ltung ba thabs ma yin pas kun tu bcom pa'i dmyal bar skye'o //
analyzed: shi bar gyur nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan song log par ltung ba thabs ma yin pas kun tu bcom pa'i dmyal bar skye'o //
translated: When he dies, after the destruction of the body, he falls into the lower realms, into the Unrelenting Hell.

original: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa de'i skyon ni; 'di yin no //
analyzed: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa de'i skyon ni; 'di yin no //
translated: This is the fault of composing poetry with bad learning.

original: gzhan yang thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags rnams sdeb par byed pa'i skyon chen po ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags rnams sdeb par byed pa'i skyon chen po ni /
translated: “ ‘There is another great fault of composing poetry with bad learning.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What is it?

original: dge sbyong ngan pa de snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa la rgyags shing mun par gyur te; blo shin tu long bar gyur pa'i phyir thos pa ma yin /
analyzed: dge sbyong ngan pa de snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa la rgyags shing mun par gyur te; blo shin tu long bar gyur pa'i phyir thos pa ma yin /
translated: The bad monk is intoxicated with his poetry, and is in the dark, because his mind is completely blinded. He has not studied,

original: mthong ba ma yin /
analyzed: mthong ba ma yin /
translated: has not seen,

original: gzhan dag rnams kyi drung na nyan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag rnams kyi drung na nyan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: and has not listened to others.

original: de la 'di snyan dngags sdeb par byed par 'dod pas kyang nges par 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la 'di snyan dngags sdeb par byed par 'dod pas kyang nges par 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He wants to compose poetry, but is bound by it.

original: rab tu gnas par byed do //
analyzed: rab tu gnas par byed do //
translated: He is attached to it.

original: gzhan dag rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshig gi rkang pa brjod pa rnams kyis nye bar 'brel par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan dag rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshig gi rkang pa brjod pa rnams kyis nye bar 'brel par byed do //
translated: He is connected to others by the various verses he composes.

original: ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ba de @290b bzhin du de nyid kyis don de dag rnams dngos mthong bar gyur nas de dag gis skyes bu ngan pa de de bzhin du 'joms par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ba de @290b bzhin du de nyid kyis don de dag rnams dngos mthong bar gyur nas de dag gis skyes bu ngan pa de de bzhin du 'joms par 'gyur ro //
translated: When he is born in that way, he sees those very things that he has written about. Those things destroy that bad man in that way.

original: rang gi sems kyi kun nas slong bas yongs su bsdebs pa'i rdzun de dag rnams kyi skyon des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu thabs min pa'i log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi sems kyi kun nas slong bas yongs su bsdebs pa'i rdzun de dag rnams kyi skyon des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu thabs min pa'i log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The faults of those lies that are fully combined with the motivation of one’s own mind, after the body breaks up and death occurs, will cause rebirth in the lower realms, the unfortunate realms, the hells.

original: snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa'i skyon gyis gzhan yang skyon chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa'i skyon gyis gzhan yang skyon chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: There is also a great fault from composing poetry.

original: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa rnams kyi ni /
analyzed: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa rnams kyi ni /
translated: For those who delight in bad learning, in composing poetry,

analyzed: 'di lta ste / thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur pas snyan dngags gzhan dag rnams rnyed pa yang nyan par byed do //
translated: it is like this:🔽Those who delight in bad learning, in composing poetry, will also listen to other poetry that they find.

original: des de dag rnams thos nas kyang rang gi rnams sgrub pa'i don du rab tu zhe sdang bar byed pa dang / sngon gyi snyan dngags pa rnams la 'phya bar byed do //
analyzed: des de dag rnams thos nas kyang rang gi rnams sgrub pa'i don du rab tu zhe sdang bar byed pa dang / sngon gyi snyan dngags pa rnams la 'phya bar byed do //
translated: After hearing that, they will become angry for the sake of their own composition and will disparage the earlier poets.

original: mdzes par gyur pa'i snyan dngags la rab tu zhe sdang bar byed pa'i dge sbyong ngan pa de ni /
analyzed: mdzes par gyur pa'i snyan dngags la rab tu zhe sdang bar byed pa'i dge sbyong ngan pa de ni /
translated: The evil monk who is hostile to beautiful poetry🔽will, when his meditation is empty, increase his malice.

original: de ltar bsam gtan sgom pas stong par gyur nas gnod sems mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan sgom pas stong par gyur nas gnod sems mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will accumulate

original: dri ma can gyis las rnams ni /🔽kun nas rab tu bsags par 'gyur la /
analyzed: dri ma can gyis las rnams ni / kun nas rab tu bsags par 'gyur la /
translated: defiled actions.

original: 'di'i dkar po'i chos rnams ni /
analyzed: 'di'i dkar po'i chos rnams ni /
translated: His virtuous qualities will be exhausted.🔽He will be a friend who makes miserable the world beyond,

original: zad par 'gyur bas 'jig rten pha rol tu bde bar byed pa'i grogs tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams de ltar gshe bar byed do //🔽thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa rtag tu pag med pa la sems pa rnams la ni /🔽gzhan yang skyon chen po yod de /
analyzed: zad par 'gyur bas 'jig rten pha rol tu bde bar byed pa'i grogs tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams de ltar gshe bar byed do // thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa rtag tu pag med pa la sems pa rnams la ni / gzhan yang skyon chen po yod de /
translated: and he will abuse his fellow practitioners of spiritual life.

original: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags rnams sdeb pa la ched @291a *//
analyzed: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags rnams sdeb pa la ched @291a *//
translated: Moreover, there is a great danger for those who are engaged in the composition of poetry, who are always thinking about what is worthless, and who are listening to bad teachings.

original: cher byed pa rnams ni /
analyzed: cher byed pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who are devoted to the composition of poetry,

original: nyin med mtshan med du de la blo bzod glags med par gyur nas snyan dngags sdeb pa la shin tu ched che bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyin med mtshan med du de la blo bzod glags med par gyur nas snyan dngags sdeb pa la shin tu ched che bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Day and night, he is unable to bear it, and becomes very devoted to composing poetry.

original: de dam pa'i chos sems par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de dam pa'i chos sems par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: He does not think about the holy Dharma.

original: sgom par mi byed do //
analyzed: sgom par mi byed do //
translated: He does not meditate.

original: nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i ched du mi 'jug go /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i ched du mi 'jug go /
translated: He does not apply himself to the pacification of the afflictions.

original: de nyan pa la blo zhugs par gyur na'ang dam pa'i chos 'byung bar don med de /
analyzed: de nyan pa la blo zhugs par gyur na'ang dam pa'i chos 'byung bar don med de /
translated: Even if he does apply himself to listening, the holy Dharma is useless for him.

original: phyir log nas 'gro'o //
analyzed: phyir log nas 'gro'o //
translated: He turns back and goes away.

original: gang bskal pa stong phrag brgyar yang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches pa 'dis de ltar nyams par byed do //🔽thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa la ni /
analyzed: gang bskal pa stong phrag brgyar yang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches pa 'dis de ltar nyams par byed do // thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags sdeb par byed pa la ni /
translated: This bad mendicant, who pretends to be a mendicant, ruins what is not to be ruined, what is difficult to find even in a thousand aeons.

original: gzhan yang skyon chen po yod de /
analyzed: gzhan yang skyon chen po yod de /
translated: There is another great fault in bad listening, in composing poetry:

original: skyes pa ngan pa de snyan dngags kyi 'dod pa dang / thos pa ngan pa dag gi bstod pas kyang phyin ci log tu smra bar byed do //
analyzed: skyes pa ngan pa de snyan dngags kyi 'dod pa dang / thos pa ngan pa dag gi bstod pas kyang phyin ci log tu smra bar byed do //
translated: The bad man, with his poetic fancies, and the bad listener, with his flattery, both speak falsely.

original: de kun tu spyod par gyur pa rnams la rten par byed do //
analyzed: de kun tu spyod par gyur pa rnams la rten par byed do //
translated: He becomes addicted to the practice of these.

original: smyon pa bzhin du gnas rnams thams cad la rab tu g-yo ba'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smyon pa bzhin du gnas rnams thams cad la rab tu g-yo ba'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: His mind becomes unsteady in all his activities, like a madman’s.

original: log par rjod par byed pa rnams kyis bcings par gyur pa'i stod pa bsdebs pa rnams la ni /
analyzed: log par rjod par byed pa rnams kyis bcings par gyur pa'i stod pa bsdebs pa rnams la ni /
translated: He becomes bound by the flattery of those who speak falsely.

original: don med pa yin no //
analyzed: don med pa yin no //
translated: It is useless.

original: 'du byed thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir yang 'di la don med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir yang 'di la don med pa yin no //
translated: It is useless because it leads to the exhaustion of all one’s resources.

original: snyan dngags kyi rgyags pas zin par gyur pa de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: snyan dngags kyi rgyags pas zin par gyur pa de dag rnams ni /
translated: Those who are intoxicated with poetry

original: ha cang thal ches par shin tu nyams par gyur @291b nas chang gi btung ba sten par byed do //
analyzed: ha cang thal ches par shin tu nyams par gyur @291b nas chang gi btung ba sten par byed do //
translated: become so excessively dissipated that they take to drinking alcohol.

original: de la sten par gyur par blo rnam par g-yeng bas kyang phan tshun du don byed do //
analyzed: de la sten par gyur par blo rnam par g-yeng bas kyang phan tshun du don byed do //
translated: and the mind, distracted by that, performs various actions.

original: chang gis kun nas g-yengs par gyur pa'i blos don cung zad cig byed par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: chang gis kun nas g-yengs par gyur pa'i blos don cung zad cig byed par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: And the mind, distracted by alcohol, does not perform even a little good.

original: sems kyang rnam par g-yeng bar byed par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir dang / don ma yin pa rnams la 'jug pa po ngan song gi sgor gyur pa'i chang ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sems kyang rnam par g-yeng bar byed par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir dang / don ma yin pa rnams la 'jug pa po ngan song gi sgor gyur pa'i chang ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: And because it causes distraction of the mind, it is the door to the lower realms, the teacher of what is not good.

original: de chang gis zin pas mi dge ba rnams thams cad byed do //
analyzed: de chang gis zin pas mi dge ba rnams thams cad byed do //
translated: When seized by alcohol, one does all that is not good.

original: bud med dag mngon par mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pas 'khrid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bud med dag mngon par mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pas 'khrid par 'gyur ro //
translated: Seeing women, one is led by improper attention.

original: de nye bar khrid par gyur nas dge sbyong ngan pa mi tshangs par spyod par byed do //
analyzed: de nye bar khrid par gyur nas dge sbyong ngan pa mi tshangs par spyod par byed do //
translated: When led by that, the bad monk engages in sexual intercourse.

original: de ni / rgyud tshig par gyur pa /
analyzed: de ni / rgyud tshig par gyur pa /
translated: He is one whose continuum is burned,

original: nang rul bar gyur ba /
analyzed: nang rul bar gyur ba /
translated: one who is rotten within,

original: thos pa dang mi ldan pa /
analyzed: thos pa dang mi ldan pa /
translated: one who is not learned,

original: sred pa'i rigs su gyur pa /
analyzed: sred pa'i rigs su gyur pa /
translated: one who is of the type that is craving.

original: bi du la'i me tog bzhin du 'bras bu med pa'o //🔽bris pa'i mar me bzhin du 'od med pa /
analyzed: bi du la'i me tog bzhin du 'bras bu med pa'o // bris pa'i mar me bzhin du 'od med pa /
translated: Like a vidula flower, it is fruitless.🔽Like a drawn-out lamp, it is without light.

original: bris pa'i zla ba bzhin du gyur pa /
analyzed: bris pa'i zla ba bzhin du gyur pa /
translated: Like a drawn-out moon, it is without fullness.

original: grang pa bzhin du rnam par smad par bya ba de ni /
analyzed: grang pa bzhin du rnam par smad par bya ba de ni /
translated: Like a cold [river], it is to be despised.

original: de dag rnams kho na bzhin du gyur pas 'di ni /
analyzed: de dag rnams kho na bzhin du gyur pas 'di ni /
translated: Since it is just like that,

original: gos kyis g-yogs pa tsam 'ba' zhig yin no //
analyzed: gos kyis g-yogs pa tsam 'ba' zhig yin no //
translated: it is merely covered by a robe.

original: dge sbyong gi gzugs dge sbyong ma yin no //
analyzed: dge sbyong gi gzugs dge sbyong ma yin no //
translated: The form of an ascetic is not an ascetic.

original: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags bsdebs par gyur pa'i skyon gyi rtsa ba de las lus zhig par gyur nas ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal bar skye'o //
analyzed: thos pa ngan pa snyan dngags bsdebs par gyur pa'i skyon gyi rtsa ba de las lus zhig par gyur nas ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal bar skye'o //
translated: Due to the root of the fault of combining bad learning with poetry, when the body is destroyed, one falls into a bad rebirth, being born in hell.

original: de'i phyir gang dag dge sbyong yin par gyur pa de dag rnams kyis thos pa ngan pa @292a *//
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dag dge sbyong yin par gyur pa de dag rnams kyis thos pa ngan pa @292a *//
translated: Therefore, those who are ascetics should not combine bad learning

original: snyan dngags bsdeb par mi bya'o //
analyzed: snyan dngags bsdeb par mi bya'o //
translated: with poetry.

original: gal te byed par gyur na'ang des dam pa'i chos gsal bar byed par 'gyur ba rnams gang yin pa dang / ci ste yang dam pa'i chos rnams yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ba sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa bya'o //
analyzed: gal te byed par gyur na'ang des dam pa'i chos gsal bar byed par 'gyur ba rnams gang yin pa dang / ci ste yang dam pa'i chos rnams yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ba sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa bya'o //
translated: He should praise the Buddhas, who are the ones who fully understand the holy Dharma.

original: dkon mchog gsum la bstod par bya'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la bstod par bya'o //
translated: He should praise the Three Jewels.

original: dam pa'i chos shin tu gsal bar byed pa'i snyan dngags bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos shin tu gsal bar byed pa'i snyan dngags bya'o //
translated: He should compose poetry that illuminates the holy Dharma.

original: de las mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
translated: That will lead to the ultimate goal of nirvāṇa.

original: ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: His efforts will bear fruit.

original: de dag gis de rab tu bsngags par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gis de rab tu bsngags par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be praised by them.

original: lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
translated: When his body breaks up, after he dies, he will be reborn as a god.

original: yang dag pa'i snyan dngags bsdebs par gyur pa dang / dam pa'i chos gsal bar 'gyur ba bsdebs pa dag gis te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i snyan dngags bsdebs par gyur pa dang / dam pa'i chos gsal bar 'gyur ba bsdebs pa dag gis te /
translated: He should compose poetry that is correct and that illuminates the holy Dharma.

original: des kyang de ltar bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: des kyang de ltar bya ba yin gyi /
translated: He should do that.

original: gzhan du na bar chad byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na bar chad byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, he will create obstacles.

original: gzhan yang chos lnga ba dge sbyong dag bsam gtan sgom pa na bar du gcod par byed pa yin te; 'di dag rnams kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos lnga ba dge sbyong dag bsam gtan sgom pa na bar du gcod par byed pa yin te; 'di dag rnams kyang gang zhe na /
translated: Moreover, these five things are obstacles for ascetics who are practicing concentration. What are the five?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: rgyu skar bgrang ba dang / sems par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar bgrang ba dang / sems par byed pa'o //
translated: reckoning the stars and thinking.

original: dge sbyong dag dge sbyong du khas 'ches pa rnams kyis gnas skabs thams cad du'ang rgyu skar bgrang ba dang / bsam par yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge sbyong dag dge sbyong du khas 'ches pa rnams kyis gnas skabs thams cad du'ang rgyu skar bgrang ba dang / bsam par yang mi bya'o //
translated: Ascetics who claim to be ascetics should not reckon the stars or think about them at any time.

original: de las kyang dge sbyong la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis rnam par smrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang dge sbyong la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis rnam par smrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, worldly people will criticize ascetics for this.

original: bsam gtan sgom par byed @292b pa na bar du gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan sgom par byed @292b pa na bar du gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be an obstacle for them when they are practicing concentration.

original: de bsam pas kyang bsod nams dang tshe'i 'du byed rnams nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bsam pas kyang bsod nams dang tshe'i 'du byed rnams nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Their merit and life force will decline due to thinking.

original: bde legs rnams kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde legs rnams kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not attain well-being.

original: tshe zad par gyur pa de bya ba ma yin pa byed pa'i phyir nad las dang / rga ba las dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / ngal ba rnams las yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe zad par gyur pa de bya ba ma yin pa byed pa'i phyir nad las dang / rga ba las dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / ngal ba rnams las yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of engaging in non-virtuous actions, they will not be liberated from sickness, aging, death, suffering, unhappiness, and fatigue.

original: dus yun ring por 'khor bar yongs su 'khyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus yun ring por 'khor bar yongs su 'khyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will wander for a long time in cyclic existence.

original: 'di la rgyu skar bgrangs pa rnams kyis kyang cung zad kyang mi byed do //
analyzed: 'di la rgyu skar bgrangs pa rnams kyis kyang cung zad kyang mi byed do //
translated: The astrologers do not do anything for them at all.

original: bdag la ma yin zhing gzhan rnams la'ang skyob pa ni /
analyzed: bdag la ma yin zhing gzhan rnams la'ang skyob pa ni /
translated: They are not a refuge for themselves, nor are they a refuge for others.

original: rgyu skar rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu skar rnams ma yin no //
translated: The astrologers are not a refuge.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: las kyis de dag rnams 'jug par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: las kyis de dag rnams 'jug par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: They are driven by karma.

original: rgyu skar rnams ni /
analyzed: rgyu skar rnams ni /
translated: The astrologers

original: skyabs ma yin no //
analyzed: skyabs ma yin no //
translated: are not a refuge.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu skar gcig nyid la yang bde ba can rnams dang / sdug bsngal can rnams dang / skye ba gzugs ngan pa dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang / rigs dman pa dang / chos pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: rgyu skar gcig nyid la yang bde ba can rnams dang / sdug bsngal can rnams dang / skye ba gzugs ngan pa dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang / rigs dman pa dang / chos pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang /
translated: Even in a single lunar mansion, there are those who are born in Sukhāvatī, those who are born in the hells, those who are born with ugly bodies, those who are born with beautiful bodies, those who are born in high castes, those who are born in low castes, those who are born as religious people, those who are born as irreligious people,

original: dbul po dang / phyug po dang / rkun ma dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / mkhas pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
analyzed: dbul po dang / phyug po dang / rkun ma dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / mkhas pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
translated: those who are born as poor people, those who are born as rich people, those who are born as thieves, those who are born as kings, those who are born as bandits, those who are born as wise people, those who are born as fools, those who are born as women, those who are born as men, those who are born as people with ethical discipline, those who are born as people with unethical discipline,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / le lo can dang / 'jig rten pa sdug par 'dzin pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang @293a *//
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / le lo can dang / 'jig rten pa sdug par 'dzin pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang @293a *//
translated: those who are born as people who are diligent, those who are born as people who are lazy, those who are born as worldly people who hold things to be beautiful, and so on.

original: rgyu skar gcig la skye'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar gcig la skye'o //
translated: All of these are born in a single lunar mansion.

original: gal te yang rgyu skar rnams rgyu mtshan yin par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te yang rgyu skar rnams rgyu mtshan yin par gyur na /
translated: If the lunar mansions were the reason,

original: de la gang dag rgyu skar gcig la skyes par gyur pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //🔽skyes bu rnams kyis ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu skar rnams ni /
analyzed: de la gang dag rgyu skar gcig la skyes par gyur pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang mtshungs par 'gyur ro // skyes bu rnams kyis ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu skar rnams ni /
translated: Those born under the same constellation will be similar.

original: bgrang bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: bgrang bar mi bya ste /
translated: People should not calculate the constellations as explained.

original: sngon gyi skyon dang yon tan dang bcas pa rnams mngon par mi shes pa'i phyir ro;/
analyzed: sngon gyi skyon dang yon tan dang bcas pa rnams mngon par mi shes pa'i phyir ro;/
translated: Because they do not know the past good and bad qualities.

original: dge ba dang mi dge bar gyur pa'i dus rnams su skar mar gyur pa'i rgyu skar rnams bgrang bar byed do //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge bar gyur pa'i dus rnams su skar mar gyur pa'i rgyu skar rnams bgrang bar byed do //
translated: They calculate the constellations that are stars at times that are good and bad.

original: gzhan yang rgyu skar 'di dag rnams bgrang ba dang / dpyod par byed pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyu skar 'di dag rnams bgrang ba dang / dpyod par byed pa ni /
translated: Moreover, those who calculate and analyze these constellations

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: are like this:

original: rgyu skar rnams ma shar ba dang / gang gi phyir mdun du byas par gyur pas rnam par dag pa rnams kyang nyung ba dang / lhag par 'gyur bag dang / mngon par gsar ba yin pa dang / rgyu skar gyis rgyu skar gzhan rnams zil gyis kyang gnon  no //
analyzed: rgyu skar rnams ma shar ba dang / gang gi phyir mdun du byas par gyur pas rnam par dag pa rnams kyang nyung ba dang / lhag par 'gyur bag dang / mngon par gsar ba yin pa dang / rgyu skar gyis rgyu skar gzhan rnams zil gyis kyang gnon  no //
translated: When the constellations have not risen, and because they are done in front, the pure ones become few, excessive, and manifest, and one constellation also overwhelms another constellation.

original: gzhan yang gza' skar de nyid kyang dus gzhan na zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang gza' skar de nyid kyang dus gzhan na zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, that very planet will be eclipsed at another time.🔽

original: de dag rnams las rgyu skar mi mdzes pa dang mdzes pa ma yin pa rnams dpyod par byed pa yin no //🔽gang sems par byed pa dang bgrang bar byed pa'i rgyu skar rnams kyi dbang gis bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yin na /
analyzed: de dag rnams las rgyu skar mi mdzes pa dang mdzes pa ma yin pa rnams dpyod par byed pa yin no // gang sems par byed pa dang bgrang bar byed pa'i rgyu skar rnams kyi dbang gis bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yin na /
translated: Moreover, the very same planets and stars that are considered to be auspicious or inauspicious are themselves subject to the influence of other planets and stars.🔽The planets and stars are not the cause of happiness and suffering.🔽If happiness and suffering are caused by the influence of the planets and stars that are thought about and counted, then how can they be powerful?

original: gang gis ji ltar bdag nyid la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang du byas nas gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis ji ltar bdag nyid la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang du byas nas gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur /
translated: How can they be the cause of happiness and suffering?

original: ji ltar na gzhan rnams kyis sdug @293b bsngal dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzhan rnams kyis sdug @293b bsngal dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: How can they be the cause of happiness and suffering for others?

original: de'i phyir las rnams nyid kho na las dge legs dang dge legs ma yin pa'i 'bras bu rnams yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir las rnams nyid kho na las dge legs dang dge legs ma yin pa'i 'bras bu rnams yin no //
translated: Therefore, only karma is the cause of happy and unhappy rebirths and the results of happiness and suffering.

analyzed: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba rnams yin te /

analyzed: dpyod par mi byed do; ;de dag rnams kyang gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dge slong rgyu skar sems par byed pa rnams ni /
translated: “Monks, those who contemplate the stars

analyzed: de dag rnams bgrangs pa las kyang don ma yin par 'gyur ro //

translated: They will not analyze the body with the thirty-six impurities, which are the highest goal for attaining nirvāṇa, but which are still afflicted and harmful.

analyzed: ma yin no //

original: bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya'o //

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa shes pa'i lam yan lag @296b brgyad kyis so sor brtags na ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa shes pa'i lam yan lag @296b brgyad kyis so sor brtags na ni /

analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar gyi dpyad ra rnams 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro //

original: mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ba dang / shis par 'gyur ba dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'ang yin no //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ba dang / shis par 'gyur ba dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'ang yin no //

analyzed: tha mal ba'i 'jig rten pa'i gza' rnams dpyad pa dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang spyad par gyur pa'i skyes bu ni /

analyzed: brgya stong du ma rnams su 'gros nor nas dmyal ba dang / yi dvags dang / dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //

original: 'jig rten pa de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa de dag rnams ni /

analyzed: 'khor ba kun nas 'jug par byed pa /

analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams kun nas skyes par byed pa yin no //

original: gang yang dus dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar de dag rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis bsam par bya bar bshad pa de dag rnams rnal 'byor dpyod pas bsam zhing bsgoms te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas rga ba dang /

translated: “Those who analyze and contemplate the path that transcends the world, and who discern it correctly, will be liberated from the hundreds of thousands of sufferings of aging,

analyzed: na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba stong phrag brgya las rnam par grol ba'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur te /

analyzed: dge sbyong rnams dang / dge sbyong du dam bcas pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal zad par 'dod pa rnams kyis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zad par @297a *//
translated: Those who are renunciants, those who have taken up the life of a renunciant, and those who wish to end suffering will end the suffering of cyclic existence.

analyzed: 'gyur ba'i rgyu skar rnams la dpyad pa bsgom par bya'o //

original: shes par 'gyur ba ma yin /
analyzed: shes par 'gyur ba ma yin /

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba yang ma yin gyi /

analyzed: dge slong des bsam gtan bsgoms par gyur pa na rnam par sreg par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa dang / rgyu skar bgrang ba dang sems par byed pa na dge slong la rnam par gshe par byed par yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gzhan yang chos drug par gyur pa bsam gtan sgom pa na bar du gcod par byed pa rnams ni /

analyzed: dge slong dang dge slong du khas 'ches pa rnams kyis bsam par yang mi bya'o //

original: 'di yang gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di yang gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /

original: rgyu mtshan sems pa dge sbyong gis mi bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan sems pa dge sbyong gis mi bya'o //
translated: The ascetic should not think about the reasons for this.

original: 'jig rten pa kun nas nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kun tu gsal bar byed par gyur pa dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bar du gcod par byed pa rnams kun tu 'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan sems pa las yin te /

analyzed: de las g-yo ba 'byung ba rnams nyin mo dang / mtshan mo yang dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches pa rnams ni /

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sa gzhi las kyi rgyu mtshan nye bar mtshon par byed do //

analyzed: ji lta bar rgyu mtshan 'di dag rnams @297b 'byung bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: 'di ltar chu kun tu gnas pa'i rdzing bu dag rlung gis dkrugs par byed la /

analyzed: ji srid du rab tu g-yos par gyur pas rnyog pa can du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: zla ba gzas 'dzin par gyur na chur mar nag 'bying bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bya rnams dma' ba nas 'gro na'ang nam mkha' la nyi ma gzas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: phyogs rnams la 'dod chags dang bral bar nye bar dmigs par 'gyur ro //

original: dge ba la ni /
analyzed: dge ba la ni /

analyzed: 'di dag rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: rlung rtsub mo dag rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ro //

original: de ltar dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches par byed pa 'dis bsam gtan sgom pa'i bar du gcod par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams mtshon par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches par byed pa 'dis bsam gtan sgom pa'i bar du gcod par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams mtshon par byed do //
translated: In this way, the evil mendicant, who pretends to be a mendicant, indicates the reasons that obstruct the cultivation of concentration.

original: rgyal po dag la'ang ston par byed do //
analyzed: rgyal po dag la'ang ston par byed do //

analyzed: rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i don du rgyal ba dang pham par 'gyur ba rnam par dpyod par byed do //
translated: For the sake of gain and honor, he analyzes victory and defeat.

original: des de bzhin @298a *//
analyzed: des de bzhin @298a *//
translated: In this way,

analyzed: du rgyal po rgyal ba dang pham pa 'dod par gyur pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yid la kun tu skye ste /

original: de dag gi rtsa ba las ni /
analyzed: de dag gi rtsa ba las ni /
translated: The root of these is

analyzed: gti mug yin pas skyon gsum po 'dis g-yogs par gyur pa de ni /

analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa yin no //

analyzed: yang rim pa gzhan gyis ma rungs pa'i rgyu mtshan 'di dpyod par gyur pa la /

analyzed: rgyal po dag phan tshun du kun tu 'joms par gyur pa /

analyzed: gsod par byed pa dang / 'dzin par byed pas kyang yul ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / grong chung rnams phan tshun du stongs par byed do //
translated: And because of the killing and the capturing, the countryside, the districts, and the villages will be emptied out.”

original: srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de'i tshe rgyal po dag phan tshun du 'bras par gyur pa ste /

original: de la mdor bsdu na skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di dag rnams kyi ni /
analyzed: de la mdor bsdu na skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di dag rnams kyi ni /
translated: In brief, this great assembly of people

analyzed: dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches pas ltad mo btsugs pa yin no //

analyzed: rgyal po gcig rnam par rgyal @298b par gyur pas rgyal po gzhan la dbang che ba'i rgyu mtshan nye bar mtshon par byas nas de 'di snyam du nye bar sems te /

analyzed: dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches pa den yid kyi dge ba gang yin pa'i chos de nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The bad spiritual practitioners, who pretend to be spiritual practitioners, will lose the wholesome mental states.

original: bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa na'ang dge ba mngon par mi 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa na'ang dge ba mngon par mi 'phel lo //

original: rgyal ba dang mi rgyal ba rnams kun tu rtogs par byed pa po zhi bar gyur pa'i chos rnams kyang ma bsam pas lus zhig par gyur pa na shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal bar skye'o //

translated: They will not consider the wholesome states that are the cause of victory and non-victory, and so, when their body breaks up, they will fall into the lower realms and be born in hell.

original: rgyu mtshan 'di dag gi phyir na dge sbyong rnams dang dge sbyong du khas 'ches pas rgyu mtshan gyi dpyad ra 'jig rten pa mi bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan 'di dag gi phyir na dge sbyong rnams dang dge sbyong du khas 'ches pas rgyu mtshan gyi dpyad ra 'jig rten pa mi bya'o //
translated: For these reasons, spiritual practitioners and those who pretend to be spiritual practitioners should not engage in worldly analysis.

original: 'jig rten pa'i dpyad ra gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dpyad ra gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: This worldly analysis

original: skyon gsum skyed par byed pa'ang 'di yin te /
analyzed: skyon gsum skyed par byed pa'ang 'di yin te /
translated: generates three faults:

original: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bar du gcod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bar du gcod par byed pa yin no //

analyzed: de la sbyon gsum po de dag rnams la rim gyis nges par rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dpyad par bya'o //
translated: The three worlds are to be analyzed in terms of the supramundane practice that leads to gradual liberation.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /🔽ji ltar 'dis sa gzhi g-yo nye bar mtshon par byed pa /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / ji ltar 'dis sa gzhi g-yo nye bar mtshon par byed pa /
translated: It is as follows:🔽Just as the earth is shaken,

analyzed: nyin mo dang mtshan mor yang ji ltar sa g-yo pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: so the earth shakes day and night.

original: zhes de kho na ltar ni /🔽nam yang dpyod @299a *//
analyzed: zhes de kho na ltar ni / nam yang dpyod @299a *//
translated: In that way,

original: par mi byed de /
analyzed: par mi byed de /
translated: one should never analyze.

analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du'ang sems kyis sa gzhi g-yo bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: dper na / sa gzhi 'di kun nas g-yo bar gyur na nags dang / nye ba'i nags dang / ri dang / chu rlung dang / shing dang / grong dang / tshong dus su bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag rnams 'jig par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, when this earth is shaken all around, this world with its forests, parks, mountains, rivers, trees, villages, towns, and cities is destroyed.

original: de kho na bzhin du sems kyi sa gzhi 'di rab tu g-yos par gyur na /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du sems kyi sa gzhi 'di rab tu g-yos par gyur na /

analyzed: des de ltar lam rnyed par ma gyur pas yid shin tu skyo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one does not find the path and becomes very discouraged.

original: de slar yang skyil mo krung las ldang bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de slar yang skyil mo krung las ldang bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Then, rising from his cross-legged posture, he thought:

original: ji ltar bdag gis khengs par byas pa de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag gis khengs par byas pa de dag rnams ni /
translated: “What I have done is meaningless.

original: don med do //
analyzed: don med do //
translated: It is useless.”

original: zhes skyo ba skye bar gyur nas 'di na lam med do //
analyzed: zhes skyo ba skye bar gyur nas 'di na lam med do //
translated: He became discouraged and said, “There is no path here,

original: bsam gtan med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan med do //
translated: no concentration,

original: snyoms par 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa med do //
translated: no meditative absorption.”

original: zhes de bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu rnams la nga rgyal gyi skyon gyis dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pas skur pa 'debs par byed de /
analyzed: zhes de bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu rnams la nga rgyal gyi skyon gyis dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pas skur pa 'debs par byed de /
translated: Because of the fault of pride and the fear of being overwhelmed, he denied the results of concentration and the results of meditative absorption.

original: yongs su ma @318b dris pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su ma @318b dris pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he did not ask questions,

original: log par lta ba can de lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: log par lta ba can de lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: that man of wrong views, when his body broke up, died and fell to the lower realms, taking rebirth in the hells.

original: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'od srung des tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa ji ltar /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'od srung des tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa ji ltar /
translated: Then, at that time, the Bhagavān Kāśyapa spoke these verses:

original: bdag nyid shes shing nga rgyal bral //
analyzed: bdag nyid shes shing nga rgyal bral //
translated: “Knowing oneself, free from pride,

original: de bzhin bla ma la 'dri ba //
analyzed: de bzhin bla ma la 'dri ba //
translated: And ask the teacher about it.

original: dge slong shin tu brtson ldan pa //
analyzed: dge slong shin tu brtson ldan pa //
translated: The monk who is very diligent

original: mya ngan 'das pa rtogs pa yin //🔽de ltar ji tsam thos gyur pa //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa rtogs pa yin // de ltar ji tsam thos gyur pa //
translated: Will realize nirvāṇa.🔽To the extent that he studies

original: de tsam zhig ni 'chad par byed //
analyzed: de tsam zhig ni 'chad par byed //
translated: To that extent he will teach.

original: bdag nyid shes dang nga rgyal bral //
analyzed: bdag nyid shes dang nga rgyal bral //
translated: Free from pride and self-satisfaction,

original: de nyid rig pa'i dge slong yin //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa'i dge slong yin //
translated: He is a monk who knows reality.

original: nga rgyal shin tu nga rgyal bral //
analyzed: nga rgyal shin tu nga rgyal bral //
translated: Free from pride and conceit,

original: gang dag ye shes lam la mkhas //
analyzed: gang dag ye shes lam la mkhas //
translated: Those who are skilled in the path of wisdom,

original: rang gzhan bdag nyid thabs shes pas //
analyzed: rang gzhan bdag nyid thabs shes pas //
translated: Knowing the methods for their own and others’ benefit,

original: chog shes gang yin dge slong brjod //🔽nga rgyal can dang khro ba'i yid //🔽rko rtog can dang blo chung ba //
analyzed: chog shes gang yin dge slong brjod // nga rgyal can dang khro ba'i yid // rko rtog can dang blo chung ba //
translated: Are called monks who are content.🔽How can there be peace🔽For those who are proud, have angry minds,

original: rnyed dang bkur sti yid can la //
analyzed: rnyed dang bkur sti yid can la //
translated: Are inquisitive, and are of little intelligence,

original: ci phyir zhi ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ci phyir zhi ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: And whose minds are set on profit and honor?

original: 'dri bar mi byed pa nyid kyi nga rgyal can khro ba'i yid du gyur pa bsam gtan sgom par mi byed pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'dri bar mi byed pa nyid kyi nga rgyal can khro ba'i yid du gyur pa bsam gtan sgom par mi byed pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who are proud, have angry minds, and do not practice meditation,

original: gzhan gyi zas za bar byed pa rnams bu lon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zas za bar byed pa rnams bu lon du 'gyur ro //
translated: will have to pay back the food they have eaten from others.

original: cha byad 'ba' zhig tsam 'dzin par gyur pa rnams kyis dge slong gi bdag nyid ci zhig thob par gyur nas lus zhig par gyur cing shi ba'i 'og tu nga rgyal gyi skyon dang 'dri bar mi byed pa'i phyir na ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal bar
analyzed: cha byad 'ba' zhig tsam 'dzin par gyur pa rnams kyis dge slong gi bdag nyid ci zhig thob par gyur nas lus zhig par gyur cing shi ba'i 'og tu nga rgyal gyi skyon dang 'dri bar mi byed pa'i phyir na ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal bar
translated: What benefit is there for those who merely assume the guise of a monk, but who have no essence of a monk, when their bodies disintegrate and they die and fall into the lower realms, the hells, due to the fault of pride and not asking questions?🔽

original: skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: What benefit is there for those who merely assume the guise of a monk, but who, when their bodies give out and they die, fall into the lower realms, into the hells, due to the fault of pride and their failure to ask questions?

original: de'i phyir na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, you should train by thinking,

original: ji srid 'tsho'i @319a *//
analyzed: ji srid 'tsho'i @319a *//
translated: “For as long as I live,

original: bar du yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can gyi dge slong rnams ni /
analyzed: bar du yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can gyi dge slong rnams ni /
translated: I will be a monk who is by nature inquisitive.

original: bde ba dang / yid bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang / yid bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be happy and content.

original: lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When my body gives out and I die, I will be reborn in a happy realm, among the gods in the higher realms.

original: nga rgyal de bcom par gyur pa'i yon tan gyis de las phyi mar yang mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nga rgyal de bcom par gyur pa'i yon tan gyis de las phyi mar yang mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And by the power of having destroyed pride, I will attain nirvana in the future.”

original: gzhan yang chos bcu gnyis pa bsam gtan sgom pa na bar du gcod par byed pa 'di 'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos bcu gnyis pa bsam gtan sgom pa na bar du gcod par byed pa 'di 'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What are the twelve factors that are obstacles to the practice of concentration?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: grogs po mang bar gyur ba zhes bya bas don ma yin pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grogs po mang bar gyur ba zhes bya bas don ma yin pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: 1) Having many friends is a hindrance because it leads to all kinds of useless activities.

original: dge slong rnams nges par sreg pa 'ba' zhig la 'jug par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong rnams nges par sreg pa 'ba' zhig la 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: Monks should be like those who are completely burned up.🔽When one has many friends, monks become distracted by the many things they do.

original: gang gi tshe grogs po mang po yod par gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams par g-yeng ba mang bar 'gyur la bya ba mang bas rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ba'i blo la'ang bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan du bya ba'ang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe grogs po mang po yod par gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams par g-yeng ba mang bar 'gyur la bya ba mang bas rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ba'i blo la'ang bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan du bya ba'ang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the mind is distracted, there is no concentration and nothing to be concentrated on.

original: khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung bar gyur pa rnams kyi grogs po dang / dgra bo ma yin pa rab tu spangs pa rnams kyis de zhig grogs po gcig nyid kyang bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung bar gyur pa rnams kyi grogs po dang / dgra bo ma yin pa rab tu spangs pa rnams kyis de zhig grogs po gcig nyid kyang bya ba ma yin na /
translated: Those who have gone forth from the home life and have abandoned both friends and enemies should not have even one friend, let alone many.

original: grogs po mang po rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: grogs po mang po rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: What need is there to speak of many friends?

original: gang gi tshe le lo can ming tsam gyi dge slong du gyur nas gzhan gyi khyim rnams su rjes su rgyu bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe le lo can ming tsam gyi dge slong du gyur nas gzhan gyi khyim rnams su rjes su rgyu bar byed pa yin te /
translated: When the lazy one becomes a monk in name only and wanders through the houses of others,

original: de'i tshe na 'dis mthong ba tsam @319b nyid kyis blo rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe na 'dis mthong ba tsam @319b nyid kyis blo rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
translated: at that time, he will be distracted by mere appearances.

original: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur bas gzhan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur bas gzhan du 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be changed by seeing forms with his eyes.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The eye consciousness will be pacified.

original: dmigs pa la zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa la zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The object will not be pacified.

original: yid la byed pa nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid la byed pa nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Mental activity will not be present.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin no //
translated: There will be no meditative equipoise.

original: dus rnams thung bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dus rnams thung bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: There will be no brevity of time.🔽He will be devoted to looking at friends.

original: grogs po rnams la lta ba la ched che ba yin no; ;de bzhin du sgra rnams thos nas kyang mnyam par bzhag par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: grogs po rnams la lta ba la ched che ba yin no; ;de bzhin du sgra rnams thos nas kyang mnyam par bzhag par mi 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, when he hears sounds, he will not be in meditative equipoise.

original: mi dmigs par mi byed do //
analyzed: mi dmigs par mi byed do //
translated: He will not be non-apprehending.

original: de yid la byed pa gzhan rnams la zhugs pa na zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yid la byed pa gzhan rnams la zhugs pa na zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When he engages in other mental activities, his mind will not be peaceful.

original: ma zhi ba'i yid la byed pa rnams la dmigs pa ni /🔽zad cing ltung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: ma zhi ba'i yid la byed pa rnams la dmigs pa ni / zad cing ltung bar 'gyur la /
translated: The mental activities that are not peaceful🔽are the objects of his exhaustion and downfall.

original: gang gi tshe grogs po de dag la lta bar byed pa des mi dmigs pa'i bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe grogs po de dag la lta bar byed pa des mi dmigs pa'i bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When he looks at those friends, he will not find them.

original: de'i phyir dge sbyong gis grogs po gcig kyang mi bya na /🔽grogs po mang po ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge sbyong gis grogs po gcig kyang mi bya na / grogs po mang po ni /
translated: Therefore, a monk should not have even one friend,

original: dang por ma yin no //
analyzed: dang por ma yin no //
translated: let alone many friends.

original: grogs po la 'chel bar gyur pa'i dge slong yul ljongs rnams nas yul ljongs su rgyu bar /🔽gyur pas nye bar 'gro bar byed pa na tshe'i 'du byed rnams ni /🔽zad par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: grogs po la 'chel bar gyur pa'i dge slong yul ljongs rnams nas yul ljongs su rgyu bar / gyur pas nye bar 'gro bar byed pa na tshe'i 'du byed rnams ni / zad par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: A monk who is attached to friends goes from one country to another,🔽and in the process he exhausts his life and loses his wholesome actions.

original: dge ba'i phyogs nyams par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang 'gro ba'i mchog thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i phyogs nyams par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang 'gro ba'i mchog thob pa ma yin no //
translated: And because he has lost his wholesome actions, he will not attain the highest state.

original: skad cig tsam yang bsam gtan dang 'dod pa rtse gcig pa gnyis yid la bya bar nus pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig tsam yang bsam gtan dang 'dod pa rtse gcig pa gnyis yid la bya bar nus pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: He is not able to bring to mind even for a moment the two one-pointednesses of meditative concentration and desire.

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par @320a *//
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par @320a *//
translated: Therefore, one should train in the following way:

original: bya ste / dge slong gis kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sred pa rnams 'phel bar byed pa po'i khyim pa'i grogs po mi bya'o //
analyzed: bya ste / dge slong gis kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sred pa rnams 'phel bar byed pa po'i khyim pa'i grogs po mi bya'o //
translated: A monk should not have as a friend a householder who increases the afflictions.

original: 'di dang pha rol tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la ston par byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam nye bar ston par byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi grogs byed par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i grogs po bya bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dang pha rol tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la ston par byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam nye bar ston par byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi grogs byed par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i grogs po bya bar bya'o //
translated: One should have as a friend a spiritual practitioner who shows the path to nirvāṇa in this life and the next, who shows the path to nirvāṇa, and who is a companion in meditative concentration.

original: gang dang lhan cig tu gyur pas nyon mongs pa rnams zad par byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang dang lhan cig tu gyur pas nyon mongs pa rnams zad par byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who, when they are together, cause the afflictions to be eliminated and enter the city of nirvāṇa,

original: grogs po'i mchog yin no //
analyzed: grogs po'i mchog yin no //
translated: they are the best of friends.

original: gzhan du na ni; grogs po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dgra bo yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du na ni; grogs po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dgra bo yin te /
translated: Otherwise, they are enemies in the guise of friends.

original: gang dag don dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis ni /
analyzed: gang dag don dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis ni /
translated: Those who are not ultimate

original: grogs por 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: grogs por 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: are not friends.

original: gang dang phrad nas kun brjod pa dang gnas pa'i las su gyur pas gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyir 'gyur ba de ni /
analyzed: gang dang phrad nas kun brjod pa dang gnas pa'i las su gyur pas gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyir 'gyur ba de ni /
translated: One who, when encountered, becomes a friend through the activity of speaking and abiding,

original: grogs po yin te /
analyzed: grogs po yin te /
translated: is a friend.

original: gang yang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis nye bar ston pa dang / byed du 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: gang yang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis nye bar ston pa dang / byed du 'jug pa'am /
translated: One who, among those who practice pure conduct, teaches, causes to practice,

original: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs pa ston par byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs pa ston par byed pa'am /
translated: teaches the fear of the next world,

original: dmyal ba dang / yi dvags dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro bar skye ba'i 'jigs pa legs par ston pa rnams kyang rung ste /
analyzed: dmyal ba dang / yi dvags dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro bar skye ba'i 'jigs pa legs par ston pa rnams kyang rung ste /
translated: or teaches well the fear of being born in the realms of hell beings, hungry ghosts, and animals,

original: ji ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa rnams kyis ngan song du 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams mi bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa rnams kyis ngan song du 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams mi bya'o //
translated: one should not engage in misconduct with body, speech, and mind that leads to the lower realms.

original: de nas de'i tshe'i bcom ldan 'das 'od @320b srung des tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa ji ltar /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe'i bcom ldan 'das 'od @320b srung des tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa ji ltar /
translated: Then, at that time, the Bhagavān Kāśyapa spoke these verses:

original: grogs gang 'jig rten pha rol gyi //
analyzed: grogs gang 'jig rten pha rol gyi //
translated: “The friend who is concerned with the next world

original: grogs po de ni grogs por brjod //
analyzed: grogs po de ni grogs por brjod //
translated: Is called a friend.🔽The one who turns you away from evil,🔽Who protects you from death,

original: gang zhig sdig las zlog pa dang // 'chi 'pho las kyang srung byed pa; ;pha rol tu ni gang phan pa'i //
analyzed: gang zhig sdig las zlog pa dang // 'chi 'pho las kyang srung byed pa; ;pha rol tu ni gang phan pa'i //
translated: And who is helpful in the next world,

original: phan pa rtag tu rab tu brjod //
analyzed: phan pa rtag tu rab tu brjod //
translated: Is always said to be helpful.

original: mi rnams grogs ni de yin te //
analyzed: mi rnams grogs ni de yin te //
translated: “That is the kind of friend humans should have,

original: grogs gang gis ni 'dod pa thob //
analyzed: grogs gang gis ni 'dod pa thob //
translated: The friend through whom one obtains what one desires.

original: de ni grogs po rnams kyi mchog yin te //🔽gang gis rnam pa du ma dang // rnam par rtog pa du mas kyang //
analyzed: de ni grogs po rnams kyi mchog yin te // gang gis rnam pa du ma dang // rnam par rtog pa du mas kyang //
translated: That is the best kind of friend,🔽Through whom one is taught the Dharma

original: chos nye bar ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos nye bar ston par byed pa'o //
translated: In many ways and with many thoughts.🔽But those who encourage a lot of eating,🔽Who encourage going to the homes of householders,🔽And who encourage the pursuit of pleasant sounds,

original: 'on kyang gang dag zas phal po che rnams mngon par brjod par byed pa dang / khyim rnams su 'jug par byed pa dang / sdug pa'i sgra dang / reg bya dang / ro dang / gzugs dang / dri rnams sten pa nye bar ston par byed pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang gang dag zas phal po che rnams mngon par brjod par byed pa dang / khyim rnams su 'jug par byed pa dang / sdug pa'i sgra dang / reg bya dang / ro dang / gzugs dang / dri rnams sten pa nye bar ston par byed pa rnams ni /
translated: Textures, tastes, forms, and smells,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: Are not friends.

original: rnam pa de srid kyi grogs po 'di dag ni; gcig kyang grogs por bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa de srid kyi grogs po 'di dag ni; gcig kyang grogs por bya ba ma yin na /
translated: “ ‘These friends, who are of such a kind, are not to be befriended.

original: skyon du ma rnams skyed par byed pa'i grogs po mang po mi bya ba lta ci smos /🔽gang dag gis 'jigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba 'jig rten pha rol tu phan pa ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: skyon du ma rnams skyed par byed pa'i grogs po mang po mi bya ba lta ci smos / gang dag gis 'jigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba 'jig rten pha rol tu phan pa ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag rnams ni /
translated: So what need is there to mention many friends who create so many faults?

original: grogs po'i gzugs kyi dgra bo rnams yin no //
analyzed: grogs po'i gzugs kyi dgra bo rnams yin no //
translated: Those who create harm for the next world, and who are thus fearful, are enemies in the guise of friends.

original: dge slong gang dag rab tu chags par gyur pa rnams ni /
analyzed: dge slong gang dag rab tu chags par gyur pa rnams ni /
translated: “ ‘Monks who are very attached

original: rang gi bya ba las yongs su nyams par byed pa dang / dge sbyong bsam gtan sgom par byed pa na bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur ba yin no //🔽gzhan yang chos bcu gsum ba bsam @321a *//
analyzed: rang gi bya ba las yongs su nyams par byed pa dang / dge sbyong bsam gtan sgom par byed pa na bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur ba yin no // gzhan yang chos bcu gsum ba bsam @321a *//
translated: will lose their own activities and, when practicing concentration, will be obstructed.

original: gtan sgom par byed pa na nyams par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan sgom par byed pa na nyams par byed pa yin no //
translated: “ ‘There is also a thirteenth factor that obstructs the practice of concentration.

original: 'di'ang gang dag yin zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang dag yin zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is that?

original: kun tu 'dres par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: kun tu 'dres par gnas pa'o //
translated: It is living in a crowd.

original: dge slong rnams thams cad kyang bsam gtan sgom pa na nyams par byed par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong rnams thams cad kyang bsam gtan sgom pa na nyams par byed par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: They will cause all the monks to degenerate in their practice of meditation.

original: kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa de'ang rnam pa lnga yin no //
analyzed: kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa de'ang rnam pa lnga yin no //
translated: “ ‘There are five ways of living in close association.

original: 'di gang dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di gang dag yin zhe na /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

translated: What is it?

original: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i skyon gyis sam /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i skyon gyis sam /

translated: “ ‘Those who are attached to their own desires will also live together with those who have wrong views in towns, cities, villages, and markets. This is the second form of living together.

original: gzhan yang kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa gsum pa yod do //
analyzed: gzhan yang kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa gsum pa yod do //
translated: “ ‘There is also a third form of living together.

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: gnyen bshes dang / grogs po dang / rang gi skye bo rnams dang phrad par 'dod par gyur cing lta ba la sred par gyur bas nye bar 'gro'o //
translated: When one wishes to meet with friends, relatives, and family members, one will go to them out of craving for views.

analyzed: des de dang lhan cig tu sngon gyi khyim la goms pas slar yang de kho na bzhin du gnas par byed @321b do; ;'di ni /

original: kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa gsum pa yin no //
translated: This is the third form of living together.

original: gzhan yang kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa bzhi pa yod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa bzhi pa yod pa ni /
translated: “ ‘There is also a fourth form of living together.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows.

original: gzhan zil gyis mnan bar bya ba'i bsam pas so //
analyzed: gzhan zil gyis mnan bar bya ba'i bsam pas so //
translated: They are motivated by the desire to surpass others.

original: 'di ni / kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni / kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa bzhi pa yin no //

original: gzhan yang kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa lnga pa yod de /
analyzed: gzhan yang kun tu 'dre bar gnas pa lnga pa yod de /
translated: There is also a fifth type of bad friendship.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What is that?

original: blo rnam par g-yeng bar gyur pa'i dge slong spyod pa kun tu ma bsngams pa /
analyzed: blo rnam par g-yeng bar gyur pa'i dge slong spyod pa kun tu ma bsngams pa /
